name: Tales from Black Heaven: The Obsidian Temple
name_original: Tales from Black Heaven: The Obsidian Temple
description:
His Father was murdered many years ago, and he grows tired of the torment from his mother and stepfather. As he plans to leave the castle, he discovers things are not quite what they seem. Now he must find his true destiny, and discover that perhaps his soul is older than he is...

Taking inspiration from Final Fantasy and Pokemon games, Tales from Black Heaven is set to be a series of Games set in a universe of magic and fantasy. Featuring original and unique characters, an intricate and ever evolving plot line, and more features being added during development. Our focus right now is developing the story of the game and than adding features and side quests. At the end we hope to have a 5 chapter game with each chapter taking 30 mins to 1 hour to complete.

Obsidian Raven Studios is determined to bring a user experience that can crafted by the users during development of our games. As such we will allow Development access to those who want to try our games out now and give us feedback on what we can do to make the game better. New features will be added in almost every release until the final game is launched.

We also have planned out three more games, one more in this series and another IP based on Norse legends. Development of those games is still in the planning stage and more details will be released as they become available.
